title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: Best selling book of history on finance. Rich Dad poor dad is one of the book written which changed history and future of people who read it.

title: Intelligent Invester
description: The Intelligent Investor by Benjamin Graham, first published in 1949, is a widely acclaimed book on value investing. The book provides strategies on how to successfully use value investing in the stock market. Historically, the book has been one of the most popular books on investing and Graham’s legacy remains.

title: Power of subconscious mind
description: The Power Of Your Subconscious Mind is a self-help book, in which the author focuses on his theory that harnessing the power of the subconscious mind can bring about an amazing and positive transformation in an individuals life.

title: Power of Positive Thinking
description: The Power of Positive Thinking: A Practical Guide to Mastering the Problems of Everyday Living is a 1952 self-help book by American minister Norman Vincent Peale.

title: Bhagwat Gita
description: The Bhagavad Gita, often referred to as the Gita, is a 700-verse Hindu scripture that is part of the epic Mahabharata, dated to the second half of the first millennium BCE and is typical of the Hindu synthesis. It is considered to be one of the holy scriptures for Hinduism.

title: Rig Veda
description: The Rigveda or Rig Veda is an ancient Indian collection of Vedic Sanskrit hymns. It is one of the four sacred canonical Hindu texts known as the Vedas. Only one Shakha of the many survive today, namely the Śakalya Shakha.

title: Quran
description: The Quran, also romanized Qur'an or Koran, is the central religious text of Islam, believed by Muslims to be a revelation from God. It is organized in 114 chapters, which consist of verses.

title: Atomic Habits
description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation.

title: Think and Grow Rich
description: Think and Grow Rich is a book written by Napoleon Hill in 1937 and promoted as a personal development and self-improvement book. He claimed to be inspired by a suggestion from business magnate and later-philanthropist Andrew Carnegie.

title: The Art of Public Speaking
description: The Art of Public Speaking by Dale Carnagey and J. Berg Esenwein is the masterpiece of communication, a classic book from a recognized master on the topic. A good read and foundational materal for anyone looking at public speaking as a career.

title: How to Attract Women
description: Hi, my name is Zac Miller. In my many years here on earth I've had my share of experiences with women. And like most men, I wasn't born knowing what attracts women or what they want, but there came a point in my life where I was fed up and did something about it. Many men just say 'women are crazy,' and they leave it at that, without trying to understand what they truly desire in a man.

title: Law of Attraction
description: The Secret opened the world to the power of positive thinking. Now, Law of Attraction will guide you through every step toward getting the life you've always desired -- and deserved.
